page.title: 02 The Main Road
page.content: { {This is the A38 Exeter to Bournemouth road. At the beginning of the twentieth century there are photographs showing it as a cart track. We did a traffic census in September 1985 for several ten minute periods. The average number of cars passing going east was forty, the average number of cars going west was ninety six. In the height of summer this number increases. This road divides the village in two. The buildings stretch out along the road and there is no village centre (i.e. village green). In contrast to the Roman road which follows the ridge, the main road follows the valley.
